solution_line_template: First multiply her average grade by the number of tests she took to find the total number of points she scored: {average_grade_after_second_test} points * {num_tests_after_second} = <<{average_grade_after_second_test}*{num_tests_after_second}={total_points_after_second}>>{total_points_after_second} points

Then subtract the number of points she scored on her first exam to find how many points she scored on her second exam: {total_points_after_second} points - {grade_first_test} points = <<{total_points_after_second}-{grade_first_test}={grade_second_test}>>{grade_second_test} points
